form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: American Consulate General Tijuana, Mexico, A19 925 596, A19 925 598

full_text: A19 925 596 A19 925 598 FOIA (b)(6) August 30, 1972 American Consulate General Tijuana, Mexico Visa Section Post Office Box 1358 San Ysidro, California 92073 Gentlemens This is to inform you that a Public Charge Bond in the sum of $4,500.00 was posted with this Service on August 29, 1972, in behalf of Juan Quintana-Sanches. Baltazar Dias de Quintana and FOIA (b)(6) who are applicants at your Consulate. The bond was posted by Romando Quintana-Dias, 1126 South Kern Avenue, Los Angeles, California 90022. Please include the attached copies of this letter with the immigrant visas to the aliens for presentation at the port of entry. Sincerely, Chas. H. Withers, Jr. Assistant District Director Travel Control Branch
